choices: Make her way to the Principal's office.
11211111111111111111.content:
Taking out her knife, she stabs it into the roof, and it easily goes through, "like I thought, this is no normal knife. This thing should let me cut my way to the classroom below". With both hands on the hilt of the blade, she pushes it and carves a hole in the room. She is very careful though, removing debris as she goes, trying not to make any noise.

As she lifts the last of the cut away section and places is beside her, she is surprised that this only took a few minutes, she was expecting it to take much longer, "this really is a good knife", she says, sheathing it and the getting ready to enter the hole. After getting inside, and being careful with her footing, she grabs one of the many square tiles that make up the ceiling of the classroom and slowly lifts it up, getting a quick peek inside.......and......nothing, no ones there. Pushing the panel to the side, she jumps down the opening she made and silently lands in the middle of the classroom that sits above the security room, her goal. Then, she hears something, footsteps. Looks like there are patrols roaming throughout the school, and one is passing by the room that she is in. Unfortunately for her, there is a window near the door to the room. Thinking quickly, she puts herself against the wall below the window and holds her breath. The footsteps get closer and stop right next to her. As her heartbeat skyrockets, she is relieved as the man starts to walk away, but she does not move until she can no longer hear him. With a sigh of relief, she goes back to her plan to infiltrate the security room. Picking the corner of the room opposite of where the door is, she takes out her knife once more and thrusts it into the ground, though much more carefully this time.

After several minutes of digging and cutting, she makes a large enough hole for her to slip through. She ends up landing on top of a solid structure, but she was expecting this, "Good, the security room is suppose to be surrounded by concrete and should be sound proof. This is where things get a little more difficult". Sticking to the same corner where she fell from, she puts the point of the knife on the concrete and while kneeling, buts both hands on the handle and begins to rotate it back and forth with both hands, like she was trying to start a fire. The reason for this was to make a small hole in the concrete in the corner of the room as far from the man in the security room and the screens as possible. She is hoping that the hole will not make enough light to give her away. The knife suddenly drops as the tip breaches the room. She pauses and listens, using her large ears for any sign of movement in the room below. After not hearing anything, she makes the hole a little bit bigger, about the size of a finger, and puts the knife aside.

Sitting down, the Elf takes a few deep breaths to calm herself and begins to chant a new spell. She focuses on the hole that she made and the magic, this time a faint blueish green glow, flows into the hole and floods the room beneath her. Finishing her chant, she listens again, and hears what sounds like someone slumping over. She takes this as a sign that her spell worked and grabs her knife, proceeding to then enlarging the hole so she can get inside. Hopping down into the room, she sees that there was indeed only one person in the room, he was in a chair, watching multiple screens, or rather, he was, until her Elven magic put him to sleep. Walking up to him, she tries to move him, but finds it difficult, "hng....ung....ha..ha..ha...so...heavy. This Elf is no where near as strong as Raven". After managing to scoot him far enough away form the monitors, she takes a look at them herself.

"Ok. Looks like I'm dealing with a pretty large group here. One at the back door, one at the front. Four patrolling the hall, one outside this room and the one I put to sleep. Lets see.....Aha! Found them, looks like they are being held in the gym at the back of the school. And yeah, they have Katie, great, and about 50 others. Four more are guarding the ways into the gym from the inside, and there are two more by the hostages. It looks like that one there is the leader of this group. So, how do I do this....wait, whats that?", the Elf says, noticing that there are a few more men around another room. "That's the principals office! Why are they there? One is guarding the door while two more are in the room, one on his computer.....This looks important.....Though it looks like there are 17 men in total, with guns and body armor, well prepared group.....why are they here?".

And so she must make a choice. Focus on the hostages, take them down, see what they are doing in the Principal's office, she needs to make up her mind and come up with a plan.....
11211111111111111111.title: Into the Security Room.

112111111111111111111.content:
With the security room under her control, she decides to find out why they are in the Principal's office. And that means that she has to get pass the guard on the other side of the door as well as the patrols. After spending some time typing away and watching the monitors, she comes up with a plan to get her there. "First, the guard, no patrol is near enough to react".

"First things first", she says, ".....how do I do this?". She opens the cover on the watch that has changed color to mach her new look, and just sees what she usually does when she has transformed, an image of her current self that if she presses, will cause her to change back into Heather. She gets an idea, putting a finger on the screen, instead of pushing it in, she slides her finger across the screen and the image moves with it. She slides the Elf picture off screen and the Raven image is now there, "So that's how it works, good thing I don't have to go back to normal before changing between girls.....though normal is still a girl......whatever!", she says, pressing the button and transforming into Raven.

She guesses it's because she is going from one transformed state to the other, but for whatever reason, she is more aware of her changing body. Her massive breasts deflate and shrink to a much smaller size, her butt loses padding as her overall size shrinks. Her hair turns jet black as it gets shorter, along with the rest of her body and her dress becomes the top as the shorts don't really change much. Raven just stands there, face flushed as she says, ".....wow.....that felt amazing.....". Recovering, she sets her plan into action.

Standing next to the door, she unlocks it and knocks. The man outside opens it and takes a few steps inside, "what", he says, before Raven grabs him and pulls him to the side, knocking him out with one swift blow. "Yeah.....good thing I became Raven for this part. That was too easy". Tossing him to the side. She closes the door and checks the monitors, no one heard anything. "Good. So far so good", she says, opening the watch and changing the image back to the yet to be named Elf. "Well, I still don't have a name for you, not that its been that long.....But a name can wait! You are more stealthy than Raven so it's back to you!", the small girl says, pressing the button and becoming the Elf again. And just like before, she stands there for a few seconds, the transformation from a petite to well endowed girl having a pleasuring effect on her body. After checking the monitors one last time, she turns off the cameras so that she isn't recorded on tape after this is over, and opens the door and heads out into the main body of the school.

"It would probably be best to take out every single person here. Guess I'll start with the patrols".

From what the monitors showed, the first of the four on patrol should be passing the security room soon. She immediately jumps upward and waits, hiding near the door. The man comes shortly after, and as soon as he passed underneath her, she drops, landing on his head and knocking him out. Throwing him into the security room, she continues her hunt, staying high as she head towards the next target. The next one is also easy, as he has his back to her as she approaches him. Getting right behind him, she takes out her knife, raises it, and hits his head hard with the hilt. He falls to the floor as she sheaths it, "not going to get blood on my hands with the likes of you".

A little further and she is now at the center of the school, where the cafeteria is. She can see the final two men on patrol here, on opposite ends of the area. Waiting until they can't see each other, she strikes the closest target. Taking out her bow, she gets ready to use it, thinking she knows why she doesn't have any arrows. Leaping towards him, he manages to let out a surprised sound as she strikes the side of his head with the bow. Quickly, she looks towards the other man, and as she feared, he heard his cry. As he aims his rifle at her, she is already on her feat and facing him. Grabbing the string of the bow, the Elf pulls it back and an arrow appears out of thin air, "as I thought", she thinks as she fires the arrow at the guy. The arrow silently flies through the air and strikes his gun. It shatters on contact and falls to the ground. He looks at it in stunned silence before looking at her. She was on him in a flash as she leaps across the cafeteria and her feet were the last things he saw before everything went black. She hides both unconscious men and goes picks up her arrow, which disappears after that, "that's a bit of a relief, the arrows will disappear if I touch them, hopefully they will also disappear on their own". She then heads to the back door of the school. Glancing around the corner, she sees that he is still in a dazed state and leaning against the wall. "Well, I don't have to worry about security or being spotted so....". She simply walks over to him and drags him away from the door before knocking him out. "Now to the front of the building".

"Gotta get him to come to me. Don't want the police, news, or anyone out there seeing me". Carefully opening the door to a nearby classroom, she enters. "Thankfully these people were smart enough to close the blinds to all the windows". She transforms back into Raven and opens the door to the hallway. She knocks on the side of the wall multiple times to get his attention and draw him towards her. It works and he heads towards the room that she was in. Once he was close enough, she grabs him and drags him into the room. Exiting the room, she transforms back into the Elf and makes her way towards the principals office.

"One guard outside and two inside. Going to have to do this careful-wait, whats that"?

The one on the computer, someone begins to talk through the radio he has.

???: Hows it going over there? We can't keep this up for too long!
Thug: I know. But it's like I've said, I've gone through their files multiple times! I can't find the target!
???: And I'm telling you that it has to be there! This is the only Middle School for miles! It has to be here! Look again! We can't leave until we find the troublemaker!

Elf Girl: So they are looking for something. And they must be planning on using the hostages to get out of here. Time to see what is so important that they would attack a school.....

Raven makes another appearance as she decides that it would probably be best to blitz them as the principals office isn't like the soundproof security room, that and she could hear them from where she is, even though the door to the room is closed. Staying low, she manages to get to the side of the guard and then rushes him. Tackling his legs, he falls with a loud thud and one swift hit to his head knocks him out. The man on the computer stands up as they both look at the door, hearing the loud thud. But Raven was too fast for them, she smashes the door and is on them in a flash, slamming their heads together. They crumple to the floor.

Raven sits in the chair and looks at the principal's computer and gets a shock, "what? Their looking at the student roster. And only at the female students.....Why?". She then remembers what She had overheard, "so they are looking for someone.....A troublemaker. Someone who got in their way, most likely recently. And that person is a student here.....and a girl.....!!!!! THOSE BASTARDS!". Raven suddenly looks really mad as she shouts this. It would seem that she figured out their objective. It was her. The group of people she stopped in the alleyway when she first transformed weren't arrested, she just beat them up and saved the girl. They must have reported what happened to their boss and they came here looking to find her to most likely pay her back for what she did.

"So.....these assholes came for revenge. They came to this school, attacked it, took it over, and took hostages to find me for stopping one of their crimes.....Putting all these people in danger for such a petty reason. I guess this is the kind of city we live in, can't do anything without fear of repercussions. But still.....a Middle School? They thought that I was a Middle Schooler......". Even Raven doesn't understand why this is making her so mad, but it still does and she cant wait to beat up the last few people in the gym.

Raven becomes the Elf and for some reason, her anger dissipates, "huh, being mistaken as a middle school student no longer bothers me.....strange.....". She heads towards the gym and waits outside one of the doors, "any second now", she says, then the power to the entire school goes out.

"Just as planned".
112111111111111111111.title: Wiping them out, thier objective, an angry Raven.

1121111111111111111111.content:
When the Elf turned off the cameras in the security room, she also set a timer on said system that would shut down the power to the entire school after a set amount of time. And as she expected, the sudden darkness caused panic in the gymnasium. From the other side of the door, she heard screams, bangs, and other loud noises, perfect for slipping in unnoticed. Then, taking a deep breath, she closes both eyes and starts to say words in the Elven language she had just learned and touches both of her eyes.

Taking a moment, she recalls what the gym looks like, she is in her first year of High School so she just left this very middle school. It was a pretty standard gym. A large area in the middle for mostly basketball and other sports and two sets of bleachers on either side with the changing rooms on either side of the floor and four doors in the corners of the large room.

Grabbing her dagger with one hand, she puts the other on the door and slowly pulls it open. Silently sliding inside, the guard on the other side of the door turns just as the handle hits the side of the head, he falls to the floor, unconscious. Dragging the body behind the bleachers, she then jumps up and grabs the side of the bleachers and surveys the scene. What she had done outside was cast a kind of self enhancement spell that lets her see in the dark.

Turns out that she was right about that one guy being the leader, he was shouting orders at the other guy near him and the remaining three guards while yelling over his radio at who she thinks is the sleeping guy in the security room.

Leader: Answer me I said! Dammit! Why won't he respond!
Thug: Maybe he got taken out?
Leader: No, not possible. He is in a sealed room with a guard outside. He would have radioed us if anything was wrong. This radio must me broken or something.
Thug: Then why did the power go out?
Leader: The cops probably cut the power, we should be ready in case they try anything stupid. Hey! Everyone here! Get over here now, use the hostages as shields!

This was the chance the elf was waiting for. She quickly and quietly makes her way to the other side of the bleachers that she was on. Looking down, she sees the guard there making his way to the center of the gym. She attacked. All she had to do was jump from the height that she was at and land on him. Jumping back up to the bleachers, she heads for the center of them and thinks of a plan to deal with the remaining four.

The other guards reach the leader, and he knows instantly that something is wrong.

Leader: Where are the other guys?". They shake their heads, "damn. Looks like we got trouble". He shoots his pistol in the air and orders the faculty and students to shut up or he will shoot them. "Now that we have some peace and quiet, lets see if we can find our little party crasher". He pulls out a flashlight and starts to scan the stadium, but our Elf was ready for this.

Taking the bow from her back, a new arrow appears as she aims at the leader. Just as she was about to fire, the light finds her, but the stunned audience below only get about a second or two of seeing an Elf with a bow before an arrow hits the flashlight, making the gym pitch black once more.

Thug: What the hell was that!?
Leader: I don't know and I don't care! Fire you idiots!

The two guards from the doors aim there rifles in her direction and fire. She jumps as the bullets land at where she just was. As she is flying through the air, she quickly fires off two more arrows which hits and destroys both guns. She silently lands on the other side of the gym in the middle of the bleachers there. Panic sets in among the kidnappers as the shattered guns fall to the floor and the assailant vanishes. The leader gets pissed off, firing his gun into the air again, he demands that she show herself or he'll shoot a hostage.

Fortunately, this was what she had hoped they would do. Opening the watch, She swipes the screen until Raven appears and leans towards the last four kidnappers. Pressing the screen, she jumps at the men as she the black light envelops her. This catches them off guard and Raven lands right int he center of them. Grabbing one of them, she throws him into the bleaches and kicks another. The other thug pulls out and pistol and points it at her, but she grabs it and punches him in the gut. That leaves the leader, who had taken a few steps back. He was already pointing his gun at her and she sidesteps just as he pulls the trigger. The leader loses sight of her after this and she melds into the darkness as he freaks out, frantically pointing his gun in every direction.

Leader: Wh-where are you!? Show yourself!

"Right here", Raven says, appearing behind him. He yells as she grabs him and pulls him away from the hostages who hear a loud crashing sound, followed by silence, then a flash of green. The bindings around the hands on one of the hostages gets cut off, freeing them, "help the others", a voice says, then they hear a door open and close.

The Elf, who had transformed back from Raven to use her dagger to free one of the hostages, leaves the room. She heads back to the security room and breathes a sigh of relief. I can't believe that worked! I got them all and no one was hurt! Well, except for the kidnappers, but fuck them!". Getting back on the security system, she restores the power and jumps back up through the holes she had made until she was back on the roof. Looking over the back of the school, she notices that her confusion spell is starting to wear off as the officers start to grab and shack their heads. "Better get out of here", she says, transforming back into Raven and jumping into the forest. She makes her way out without being spotted and makes it back to the rooftops that surround the area. Getting one last look at the school, she sees that the hostages have started to leave the school and the police were rushing inside. With a quick smile, she leaves the scene, heading back to her house.
1121111111111111111111.title: A fight in the dark.

11211111111111111111111.content:
Staying out of sight, she makes her way home. Checking from the roof of a house, she makes sure it's clear and jumps down and walks over to her front door. Unlocking and opening the door, she enters and heads to her room upstairs.

"Ugh. All of that fighting, sneaking around, and making holes has left me pretty dirty. Guess I should take a quick shower".

Out of the room and into the other, she opens the watch to change back...but pauses. Raven gets an idea, "...maybe I could...". She closes the watch and her other hand moves to the straps of the watch. Undoing the strap that holds the transforming watch to her arm, she hesitates for a moment, then removes it. Looking around the bathroom, nothing happens. Putting the watch down by the sink, she looks around again and nothing happens. "I'm not changing back?", she says, confused. Looking down at the watch, then at her reflection in the mirror above the double sink, she finds out that she can only transform back and forth with the watch, without it, she will be stuck as Raven until she puts it back on. "No way.....".

This opens up so many possibilities. Being able to stay as one of the transformed super girls will let her do so much more, but she is also aware of the problem with that, "damn. Too bad both of them were seen by people". She knows that Raven could be easily recognized by some random person or the people that are after her if she wasn't careful, the Elf might be ok....if she could successfully hide the ears. But she'll worry about that later, right now, she just wants to clean herself up. Off comes the shoes and socks. Taking off the gloves and placing them by the watch, she pulls the top off of her petite body, revealing her small breasts. Pushing a few fingers into the small soft mounds, "ahh!....they may be small, but their still very soft. Letting out a few more moans, she continues to feel herself up until she catches a look at herself in the mirror. Her face goes red again as she sees the image of her groping her breasts. This makes her stop and she quickly pulls down her tight shorts, blushing even more as she sees her exposed lower half. Checking the mirror again, she looks at the completely naked body of Raven, the girl with super strength. Even with her short stature, she still has those female curves. "I really am pretty small right now. This body and these breasts", putting both hands on her chest, "though there is something there at least. I can understand why they would think I was in middle school with this body". After she said this, she felt a sudden surge of anger, "what? Why am I so angry again!?". Calming herself down, she continues to check herself out, "it's still a nice body, though it would seem that even though I have small breasts", she turns around and looks behind her at the mirror, placing both hands on her butt, "this backside is really nice". Giving her ass a few squeezes, she then looks her body over a few more times before turning on the shower. As soon as she steps into the warm water, the dirt and debris form the day flow down her body and down the drain. "Geez, I really did need a shower, didn't I?". Grabbing a bar of soup, she washes her body then turning off the water, she grabs a tower and wraps it around herself. Taking Raven's dirty clothes, she heads to her room and places them on the floor before heading downstairs. Getting a quick drink and a snack, she heads back upstairs and stands over her bed, looking at Raven's clothes.

Picking up the top, "now that I'm getting a good look at em, my clothes as Raven don't really cover much". She puts it down, "lets see how this works". Raven puts the watch back on her wrist and switches off the transformation. After the light fades, Heather is standing there, and to her surprise, she is dressed in the clothes she had on before she left for the middle school, "guess that answers my first question. My clothes aren't actually transforming between girls, I'm getting new clothes every time I switch". She confirms this when she looks at the bed and Raven's clothes are still there. "Time for my other question", she says, opening the watch and transforming back into Raven. Yup, still in a towel. She takes that towel off and throws it away, then she opens the watch and transforms back into Heather. Almost immediately she presses the button and becomes Raven yet again. A quick glace down and she is naked, the towel is where it had landed, and the clothes that she got in that alley when she first transformed into Raven where still on the bed. "So that answers that. All it means is that I have to be careful with what I'm wearing when I transform between them and that I can change what Raven and the Elf wears. Speaking of the Elf, she needs a name.....".
11211111111111111111111.title: More Self Exploration and Some Testing.

112111111111111111111111.content:
Before picking out a name for the Elf, she takes the clothes on the bed and put them back on, "for now it would probably be best to keep these clothes with Raven". Sliding the watch to the image of the voluptuous Elf she presses it then the green light appears and fades. Unhooking the bag from her hip, she opens it up and there are now two cards inside. Placing the Raven card on the bed, she then picks up the new card and looks it over. It was nearly identical to the other card, the only difference was that it was green instead of black, the gold lining and markings were now brown, though the wing in the center was a different shade of green. Of course the front had a portrait of the Elf, and just like with Raven, there were question marks below the picture of her, "yeah, guess that will stay the same until I come up with a name for her. Let's see if we can't figure that out".

Still holding the card, she sits on her bed and closes her eyes, ".....focus.....concentrate.....look for a name.....". The letters and words that appeared shortly after her first transformation into this new form flow back into her mind as she searches for a suitable name for this girl in her native tongue. "No....not that one....no....almost....not yet....that won't do.....yes....yes! That's the one!", she yells, opening her eyes and getting off the bed. Holding the card to her face, "If I'm understanding your language right, your name shall be Adilya. At least that's what I believe it is after translating it into English. It should mean something along the lines of what's right, justice, etc, that and it does fit with what I'm doing here and it sounds like a good name to give to an Elf". As soon as she finished talking, the question marks at the bottom of the card glow and change into the new name, Adilya, in all caps. Placing the card next to Raven's on the bed, she looks them over, a satisfied smile on her face.

???: Hello Hello! I thought that I would pop in and check....up....on.....you.....". The voice belongs to Silstes, the mysterious girl who had given Brian his powers. Just like in the hospital room, she had appeared out of nowhere. As the two stare at each other, "Who-who are you!?", she suddenly yells while pointing a finger at the Elf, "why is there an Elf here!? One of your kind shouldn't be on this pla.....!!!!". She pauses when she realizes who it is, "oh. It's you. Why do you look like that? Didn't you already transform once?".

Brian explains everything that has happened to him since she last saw him in his room.

Finishing up his recollection of recent events, Silstes is now sitting on his bed, holding the cards of Raven and Adilya in her hands, dumbfounded at what she just heard. "I can't believe it", she says, "to think that you would get something so powerful".
Adilya: something so powerful? Your making it sound like there are more than one of that gem you gave me".
Silstes sighs, "it's a bit early, but I guess I can tell you a few things about that gem and whats going on". Shifting her position on the bed, she continues, "there are others like yourself that were given gems and received some kind of power form them, though there are only a handful of them. This is because those gems are very tricky to use and make. The process to create one of those gems is painstakingly long and hard. Even the process of finding a person who can pair with a gem can take years or longer. That's why there just aren't that many others like yourself".
Adilya: There are others.....ok....so why are these gems being made and who is making them? Why are they just handing them out".
Silstes: Your first and third question have the same answer so I'll start there. Do you remember what I told you in your hospital room?
Adilya: In my hospital room?". She thinks back, recalling the events that led to her getting her power. The answer hits her, "wanting to make bad people pay....".
Silstes: Correct. Only people who have a strong sense of whats right can use a gem. That's why they are made and handed out, the people that can use them will not abuse or misuse the power they receive. As for who is making them. It's an organization that does it. They also help the people who get the gems and monitor whats going on out there. Though that's all I can tell you about them for now. You'll eventually learn more, but that will be later".
Adilya:.....I see....Ok. I have one last question. Are you like me? Did you get a gem?".
Silstes:.....yes....I was given my own gem. It's been a few years now. And the reason that I gave you yours was that I agreed to help find the owner of the one I gave you and would help you out from time to time".

Silstes gets off the bed, looks at the cards and shakes her head, "still, I can't believe how strong your power is". She looks at Brian and sees the confused look on his face as he says, "how strong my power is? You did say that before. What do you mean?". Silstes asks for the pouch on her hip that holds the cards. As Brian hands her the bag, she starts, "when someone is found to have a match with a gem, they are given one and only one power when they activate it. We have seen girls with powers ranging from skills with weapons, such as swords and guns to being able to wield fire or other elements. Then they work on honing their one power and go from there. You on the other hand.....", pausing, she opens the bag and puts the cards in it and then looks at Brian. "You did get one power as well, only one. But it doesn't look like that. Your one power is the ability to transform into many different girls that each have their own set of skills and abilities. I'm going to be honest here, your power and potential is frightening". She hands him the bag and he looks down at it, letting her words sink in. It was then that she noticed the knife hanging from the Elf's hip. "What's that?", she asks. Taking it off of her hip, she responds, "oh, this? I got it when I transformed, remember? I told you I used this to get into the security room". "Oh yeah, you did say that. Can I look at it?". "Sure", she says, handing it to her. Silstes takes it and looks it over before unsheathing it. Upon seeing the blade, she gasps.
"What's wrong!?", Brian quickly says.
Silstes: Do you have any idea what this is!?
Adilya:.....um.....a dagger.....?......I guess......
Silstes: THIS IS MORE THAN JUST A DAGGER! You have no idea what this material is do you?". Again, she catches herself, and after calming herself. "That's right. Most wouldn't. Its suppose to be a mythical metal after all. I'm sure you heard of it. This dagger is made out of Mithril".
Adilya: !!!!!!! "What!?", she yells.
Silstes: Yes. A very rare metal. Light weight, easily worked, beauty like silver, but never fades, and stronger than steel. It now makes sense how you were able to cut through that building so easily". After she finishes admiring the blade, she sheathes it and hands it back to him, saying, "take real good care of that dagger. It's worth a fortune". As he takes it, he suddenly grabs the bow, having thought of something. "Could you take a look at one last thing?", she asks, drawing her bow and making an arrow appear. The Elf then takes the arrow and hands it to Silstes. "I want you to check this out as well since you seem to know so much". After looking it over, she puts a hand over her face, "yup, the points of these arrows are made of mithril as well.....The guns breaking on contact with one of these is believable now.....".

The arrow disappears and Sislstes gets up. "I've been here for too long. I need need to head back". Heading for a window, she looks back at him and says one last thing, "I have given you a lot of information on whats happening. There is still a lot more to it, but for now you should continue with what you've been doing. It has only been two days since you received your powers". And with that, she disappears into thin air once again.

Attaching the bag and dagger to her side, she looks out the window and sees that the sun has begun to set. It looks like she has about an hour or so before it gets dark. She wonders what she should do next, take Silstes advice and head out immediately to look for more crimes, or go to bed and start fresh tomorrow.
112111111111111111111111.title: Sunset and an Explanation.

1121111111111111111111111.content:
"Well, even in THIS city, nighttime is more dangerous.....guess a quick patrol wouldn't hurt".

Swapping to Raven, she uses her dark clothes and smaller stature to leave through her bedroom window and out into the night.

With the moon out and barely a cloud in the sky, the small heroine leaps from building to building through the night sky. Almost an hour into the patrol, and with nothing happening, she was about to call it quits when a scream shattered the silence around her. Immediately heading toward the noise, she finds exactly what she was looking for.

Two men mugging a woman that they had trapped in an alley behind some building. "Looks like a simple mugging", she says, as the two men start to leave with the woman's purse. "Still.....", she says, swapping the image to the Elf, "not gonna let em go". A quick press of the watch and Adilya is aiming her bow at the men.

Closing one eye, she lines up the shot and lets the arrow free. It silently soars through the night sky towards the two unsuspecting men who were laughing over their catch. The arrow catches the purse and rips it from their hands before embedding itself into the sidewalk. They stare at the arrow in disbelief before one of them snaps out of it and reaches for the purse; however, before his hands can get there, two more arrows land at their feet, causing them to jump back and away from the purse. Looking in the general direction they came from, they can't find who is shooting at them, even with this clear and bright night sky.

Adilya left her spot after firing those last two arrows and went to an adjacent building. A flash of black light and she jumps off the building, landing between the startled men. In seconds, they are on the floor. With a quick glance at the woman, who backs up in response, and she jumps up and back onto the buildings and disappears into the darkness.

One anonymous phone call to the police later and she is back in her room. Being as late as it now is, she throws off her clothes, takes a quick shower, and goes to bed, not even bothering to change back.
1121111111111111111111111.title: One last disturbance

11211111111111111111111111.content:
Waking up, she lazily heads to the bathroom. Reaching for her toothbrush, she looks up at herself and jolts at the sight of her bare breasts. ".....R-right.....still not use to that.....", she says to herself, face flushed. Wrapping up in the bathroom, she walks back into her room to find her phone vibrating. Going over to where it was plugged in, she picks it up and reads the message she got.

"Oh? From the School....let's see....Because of what happened yesterday school will be closed until further noticed.....sweet. Day off".

Changing back to Heather, than to Brian. Grabbing something to eat and a change of clothes, he grabs his bag and leaves for the city.

Passing the shop he got the clothes for Heather, he realizes something. He doesn't have any clothes for Raven or Adilya. "Damn", is all he says, knowing that he was low on cash after the spending spree he went on for his female self. Sure, he could probably make the clothes for Heather fit Adilya to an extent, though that might be a bit tight. The problem is that Raven is way to small for any of his clothes to fit her. "Guess I'm going to have to wait until I get my next allowance". He walks away and heads to the park behind the middle school in the middle of the city.

With the day off, the park is far more crowded than it usually is. And that also means that he sees a common sight that disgusts him. Two men were running a scam game right by the fountain in the center of the park. A classic guess which ball the cup is under and win the pot. Of course the pot comes from people who pay to play the rigged game. He wonders why people fall for this, knowing what kind of city this is. It also doesn't help that the police are so busy dealing with other incidents that they largely leave these games alone, they just don't have the manpower. Turning to leave, wanting to get as far away from them as possible, he stops then turns around. "Those fuckers!", he almost yells, as he heads into the trees. The reason for his anger is because he recognized those two men. They were part of the group that went after that girl when he made his debut in that alleyway.

"Nope nope nope nope! Not letting them get away with it! Not now!". Far enough away from anyone, he transforms into Adilya. Removing her elven clothes, she sifts though her bag until she comes up with a mix of Heather's and Brian's clothes that fit well enough. Finishing with a hat to help hide her ears, she hides her bow and bag up in a tall tree then hides her dagger on her as a just in case and heads back to the fountain area.

Thug 1: Come and challenge my friend here! Find the ball and win the pot! Who will finally manage to best him!?". This was when a tall busty blond walked up to them.
Adilya: This looks fun! I'll give it a try!", though she says this, inside her head, (I am going to enjoy humiliating you two scumbags!)

The two men were awestruck for a moment, but then get back to the game, "of course! To try and get the pot, you have to pay a fee of 10 bucks". She pays the fee and the game begins.

The man takes the ball and places it under a cup and starts to shuffle them around. Adilya focuses and follows what she believes the ball is, while doing this, she notices the other thug smile, but this does not bother her. The man stops shuffling the cups and puts his hands up, "now little lady, can you find the ball?".

What the elf does next surprises them, she stands up and smiles. With her left hand, she grabs the left hand of the man standing behind the other and a ball falls out of his hand as he jumps in surprise. She then quickly knocks the cups away with her other, showing that the ball wasn't under any of them. "Nice try. Nothing escapes these eyes of mine, I was onto your trick from the beginning......".

[A few minutes earlier]

Before she walked out from the trees, she prepared for the encounter. There was another reason she picked the elf besides the fact that the two men hadn't see her before. It was that Adilya's eyes were very sharp, she knew that they would be able to help her spot the trick to the game, she even took it a step further by casting a spell on them to further increase their already high detection ability. With this, she went to confront the scam artists.

[Back to the game]

Adilya: Well....even though you cheated....I still found the ball, so I WIN! I'll be taking that prize money now". She reaches for the pot, but the man grabs the arm. "You didn't actually think we'd just let you take it, did you!?", he practically yells at her, still holding her arm as he stands up, clearly angry. But the elf simply smiles and says, "of course not".

Now the elf is not as strong as his other girl, she still packs a mean punch.....or should I say kick as one of her legs finds his third leg. The man lets go of her arm due to the pain and she reacts by grabbing his head and slamming it against the table. That was more than enough to knock him out. The second guy pulls out a knife and walks toward her. Adilya reaches behind her back and takes out her dagger, "mine's bigger, she says, swinging it at his knife and sending the blade flying away. The man was stunned, and this was a mistake as she hits him hard upside the head with the handle. He falls the the floor and that ends it.

Putting her blade away, she picks up the bag with the money in it, "now what should I do with you?", she says to herself, but her pondering is interrupted as the people int he park start clapping. Surprised, she turns around to see a crowd of people behind her.

Citizen A: That was amazing!
Citizen B: You really showed those two who's boss!
Citizen C: Someone should have done that a long time ago!
And so on.

She holds out the bag and says that the people who were scammed should take their money back, but they all say that she should keep it, much to her surprise.

Citizen D: Think of it as a reward for ending their game.
Citizen E: Yeah, they'll think twice before pulling that stunt again.
Citizen F: Technically you did find the ball.....

With not a single person objecting her keeping it, she starts to walk away and back into the forest, the people still clapping until she was too far away to hear.

Back at her bag, "well....that was different....", was all she said as she put the elf's clothes back on and changed all the way back to Brian. Putting his reward into the bag, he leaves the park, knowing exactly where he was going next.
11211111111111111111111111.title: A Good Deed and an Opportunity.

112111111111111111111111111.content:
In a secluded spot near the same clothes store that he was at earlier, he becomes the elf again and changes into the clothes he wore at the park. "Maybe I should have just stayed like this, but I thought it might of been hard to get out of the park with what just happened", she says to herself before going into the store.

Just like last time, as soon as she enters the store, one of the employees immediately comes over and asks if she could be of help.

Adilya: Yes. I need a few sets of clothes, my old ones are a little tight.
Employee: I see that. Alright. Let's see what we can find.

After a quick measuring session in the changing rooms, they go about the store and pick out a few full sets of clothes for her. Paying for them, Adilya leaves and heads behind a nearby building. Putting her new clothes into the bag, she changes into Raven and finds the smallest clothes she had on her and changes into them.

To not arouse suspension, she hops onto the building she was hiding behind and after taking some money from the bag, hides it up there. Jumping back down, she leaves and walks back into the building.

The same employee practically jumps her as soon as she walks in, "Oh! And what can I help you with!?", the woman says, her face beaming.
(Great), Raven thinks, (she totally thinks I'm a little girl). So she decides to play the part, thinking that it will make it easier to get in and out. Tilting her head and fidgeting, "um...yes....I was told to come here to get some clothes....but I don't know what to do.....". Hearing this, the woman almost falls over, "L-leave it to me! I'll find you the best that we have!".

Even more measuring and some time later, Raven has her new clothes, though she made sure that what the woman helped her find weren't too "girly". Taking the cash from her pockets, she pays for them and leaves.

Getting some distance from the store, she falls to her knees, "I can't believe I just did that.....". Retrieving her bag, she puts the clothes and change into it and then decides to take a risk and stay as Raven, "hopefully I don't get recognized, though the odds of that should be pretty low....." Getting out of her baggy clothes, she decides to stick to something simple, a black shirt and jean shorts since she isn't used to or comfortable with "dressing up".

Slinging the bag around her shoulder, she hops down and walks out from behind the building. Walking down the street and not too far from the clothing store and she stops, having reached her next destination. Entering the store, Raven gives it a quick glance, "yeah, that's a lot of shoes". She spends about half an hour picking out a few pairs for all three girls, of course doing the same thing of leaving, transforming, and going back in. Content with what she picked out, she heads for home.

Placing her overstuffed bag onto the bed, she starts to go through everything she bought and what she already had in there. Separating everything by each girl, she hides the clothes and shoes deep into her closet where no one should find them, not that anyone is ever here to begin with.....

Satisfied with her trip, she sits on the side of her bed, "not even noon yet. What should I do next?"

Her smartphone then starts to ring.
112111111111111111111111111.title: Some Quick Shopping

1121111111111111111111111111.content:
Picking it up, "Oh. It's Kyle". Reaching for the screen, she stops herself, "that was close....can't answer the phone like this". Quickly switching back to Brian, he answers.

Kyle: Finally you answer. We're all going to meet in town, well.....Karen won't be there....but the rest of us will. You want to tag along? We're just going to go to a few places, maybe see a movie.....you know, the usual.

He thinks for a second. Now he could go, but he just got back from a very exhausting shopping session, well from his point of view anyway; however, on the other hand, he was looking for something to do, but on another hand, it will cut into his hero time.....

Brian: Alright, I'll go.
Kyle: Good. We're meeting soon, so hurry up and come to the usual place.

He hangs up and has yet another dilemma on his hands.....his bag.....If he takes it, no doubt his friends will question him on it, making it harder to keep his secret a secret. Should he leave it, then he won't have any change of clothes as a just in case, though would he even need to?
1121111111111111111111111111.title: Meet Up

choices: Uneventful Movie Time? Trouble? Who knows!
11211111111111111111111111111.content:
Despite the risk, there is a reason for the bag and he doesn't want to be too far from it just in case.

Taking out a set of clothes for each girl, he places them on the bottom of his bag and then puts a set of his clothes, followed by a few other items to hide them. Zipping it shut and putting it around his shoulder, he then leaves his room and his house, hoping that that was good enough to hide his secret from his friends should they get too curious.

In the city at a coffeehouse near the central park.

A bell chimes as the door opens and Brian enters.

Kyle: There you are.
Brian: Sorry about that, took longer than I thought to get here.
Sarah: Don't worry about it, c'mon! Let's get go already!
Amy: Yeah....Besides, we have something to tell you.....? Why do you have such a big bag with you?
Everyone turns and looks at it and then at him. Stepping back and nervously shifting, he says, "O-oh this? Just thought I'd try something new, you know? Cause we usually end up with a lot of bags, so maybe one big bag would help with that?", of course he's making this up on the spot.
Kyle: Alright.....I guess that could help?....Maybe?
Nathan: Forget about it, we got to get going!

A sigh of relief, and he follows his friends outside.

Amy: Brian, did you hear what happened?
Brian: What happened? Does this have to do with what you said earlier?
Amy: You don't know.....Well....Um......It's about Karen.....
(Oh. This must be about what happened at the middle school. Better play it on the safe side). "What!? Did something happen to her!?".
Kyle: No, yes....Sort of....I mean.
Sarah: Stop stuttering! Karen is fine, but what happened was that her sister was kidnapped, along with a whole lot of other kids and teachers.
Brian feigns a surprised look and asks if she is ok.
Amy: Katie is fine. It looks like no one was hurt-", but Kyle quickly butts in, "except for the bad guys!".
Nathan: Oh don't start! We don't even know if it's true!". "Who else could it have been, huh? Of course it is! It's so awesome!".
Before Brian could ask what they meant, Amy says, "It's about how they were saved. Though the police haven't told us anything yet, apparently one of the kidnapped people told the press when the got out that they were saved....by.....by.....". Again chiming in, "The monster, little girl, or whatever you call her! It was her and get this, some tall chick that saved them!".
Looking at the others, they simple shrug, look away, etc, clearly they aren't as sure as Kyle is. He continues, "These two made it past the police, and made it inside without anyone knowing. They then took out every single one of them and saved the hostages, which are now being questioned by the police and checked out at a hospital, that's where Karen and Katie are right now".
Brian: Uh-huh.....Well, at least shes ok.

They continue to walk and talk until they make it to the movie theater they always go to. Putting his bag in a locker inside the theater, they pay for their tickets and snacks after deciding to see an action movie. Finding some free seats, the lights go out as the film begins.
11211111111111111111111111111.title: Some Down Time

112111111111111111111111111111.content:
Halfway into the movie, and at a lull in the action, Brian gets up and leaves, nature giving him a call. In a stall in the men's restroom, a gun shot echoes throughout the theater as he relieves himself. "Well that doesn't sound good", he says to himself, quickly finishing up and stepping out of the stall. Of course he washes his hands, but as he was drying them, he hears something outside the men's room. He quickly dives back into the stall and activates the watch.

Hiding in a stall, a loud banging sound reaches her ears as the door to the restroom is kicked open. Raven immediately ducks down and stays low as the individual checks the stalls. When he gets to the stall she's in, she ducks under the side and into the adjacent stall to her left. The man, and at this point she knew it was one, opens the door only to see an empty stall. He proceeds to check the remainder of the stalls before walking over to the entrance. He then picks up his radio, "Men's bathroom on this side is all clear". A voice comes back, "Alright, most of the building has been checked. Go into radio silence unless it's important. We couldn't take the security room so we blocked them in, be advised that the police are probably on their way". "Roger", the man says, before leaving the room". Waiting for a little bit to make sure it's all clear, Raven leaves the stall.

"Can't I get a moment to myself before this damn city does something crazy!?". Looking at herself in the mirror, "At least I remembered to change back into my fighting clothes before changing back".

Crossing her arms, she leans back against the multi sinks below the mirror and assesses her situation. "Some people have taken over the theater, hope my friends are alright. The police are on their way and the security room is secure. That's good, but that means the cameras are still up and I don't want to be seen, especially when I'm in the men's restroom.....".

She suddenly gets an idea, "If Raven can't get out, maybe Adilya can"! A quick swap from the loli to the hourglass and almost immediately she comes up with a plan. "Most likely they've sealed the entrance of the theater, this helps me out. This will be much different from the middle school, this building is much smaller and with their barricading they've created a more airtight structure which means my aoe spells will last much longer before dissipating and wearing off".

Making her way to the door, she puts her hands together and starts to sing/chant one of her elven spells. Focusing on the area outside the restroom, a bluish green smoke begins to fill the hallway between each cinema room. As the smoke builds and gets thicker and thicker, she stops casting and instead places both the eye spells that increase their sensitivity and visibility. "Good. With this I can use my spell as a smoke screen and I'll be able to see through it better".

With the smoke seeping under the door, she reaches for the handle and opens it. For a second, she is staring at a thick wall of blue green smoke before it floods the room. Finally leaving the restroom, she turns left, toward the security room. Suddenly she trips over something. Looking down, she sees the shape of an adult male on the floor, the assault rifle next to him telling her that one of the attackers fell victim to her sleeping spell.

Like she thought and heard, the security room was barricaded and of course there are guards, but they're taking a break at the moment. The elf then takes a deep breath and switches to Raven who quickly removes the debris used to block the door then breaks the knob with her super human strength before changing back to Adilya who gasps for breath, "whew, I may be immune to my magic, but Raven isn't."

Placing herself next to the door, she pushes it open, making sure that the guards inside don't see her. Hearing them move around inside, she says, "I'm not going to attack, but please, quick, tell me how many men attacked this place." At first, silence. Adilya thought that maybe this was in vain when one of them spoke up.

Guard 1: I think I know who you are, so I'll tell ya.
Guard 2: Are you sure? This is pretty serious ya know!
Guard 1: I am....though it's getting hard to think....um....how many? There....were......twelve......in....." The guards too fall victim to her magic.
Adilya: That's all I needed to know." she says to herself, heading back into the fog.

A quick run around the smoke covered theater tells her that her magic took out half of the men. That means that the last six are in the rooms guarding the hostages.

She needs a plan, "How should I do this one....."
112111111111111111111111111111.title: Theater Dreams

1121111111111111111111111111111.content:
A flash of inspiration and she heads back to the security room. Once there, she checks the security cameras and finds that the last 6 are scattered between three areas in pairs of 2. Memorizing the rooms that they are in, she cuts the power.

The theater goes dark and she knows that she doesn't have much time before the cops storm the place. The elf opens the doors to the rooms that are empty so that she knows that they're safe. Of course her spell pours into the new space and Adilya notices that the fog is getting thinner. "Guess I need to top it off", she says to herself before recasting the sleep spell and the fog gets thicker. She keeps casting for a little longer, taking into account what will happen when she goes after the remaining men. Satisfied with the really thick wall around her, she heads to the first hostage room.

Kneeling against one of the double doors that lead into the auditorium, she puts an ear to it and listens. "Whispering, most likely from the hostages, and footsteps....more than one....the attackers....by the screen...". Placing a hand against one side of the door, she carefully and slowly pushes it open. Thankfully the doors open to hallways with the seats going upwards in the middle, this means that unless the lights were on, no one know that a door was opened. Seeing that it was safe, she fully opens the doors and uses the doorstops behind them to keep them open, letting her magical sleeping fog seep inside. Crouched, she silently moves along the side of the hallway with the seats, stopping just before the end.

One of the two men has a flashlight and he's making sure no one tries anything in the dark. Scanning the room, he suddenly stops as he notices something odd. Stunned, his partner looks at him and asks whats wrong, but he too freezes as he and the hostages notice that the sleep fog spell covering the floor and starting to rise. Panic sets in as both the thugs and hostages panic as the room fills with the mysterious fog. Adilya stays on standby, just in case things get worse, as she waits for her spell to take them.

Two thuds and a minute later and the auditorium is filled with the fog. After checking on the hostages, she takes the two men to the front of the theater and throws them with the others that she has taken out and placed here. She repeats the process at the second auditorium and with ten of them taken care of and sleeping at the front of the theater, she heads to the last one where the boss and her friends are......
1121111111111111111111111111111.title: Lights Out

11211111111111111111111111111111.content:
She follows the same procedure as the previous rooms, putting her ear to the door, slowly opening them, and then carefully making her way close to the front of this auditorium.

The two men at the front are arguing and the one with the flashlight seems to be the one in charge of this whole affair.

Leader: I don't care what you think! Keep trying to radio the others!
Underling: B-but boss, no ones responding! I've already tried so many times! Something must of happened to em!
Leader: You think! Why else would the power be out! Did you think the lights would just go out on their own!? This is just a scare tactic by the police. This is why you aren't in charge!
Underling: B-but.....W-what if it wasn't the cops?" This infuriates the leader. His face turns red with anger as he lashes out at the underling. "Oh? And who else could it possibly be! You better not say that the small monster and elf are responsible. THEY DON"T EXIST!
Underling: B-but the others said....
Leader: Don't give me that! They were mistaken! Monsters, magic, whatever! It's not real! You getting all scared over it means you're falling for the trick that the police or whoever set up and wants you to believe!
Underling: I-I know! B-but more than once.....B-BOSS!!!" The underling's complaining was cut short when he sees something and points to it. The boss looks where he is pointing and it's where the flashlight was pointing to, the floor.
Enough of the sleep spell had poured into the room to cover almost a foot off the floor, the men too distracted to notice. Shining the flashlight across the room, he can only watch as the fog continues to rise.
"I-It's them!", the underling screams. The leader turns around and punches him in the face, "snap out of it! This is nothing but a trick!".

[While this was going on]

Adilya's friends, who have been stuck in here the whole time were just enjoying the movie after Brian left when two armed men stormed into the auditorium and took them hostage. Since then they were forced to sit and wait for it to end.

Kyle:Y-you don't think?
Amy: It can't be. It should be impossible...
Kyle: What else could it be?
Nathan: The police? Maybe they're about to do something and this is the start.
Amy: Yeah.....Turning off the power is a standard move.....
Sarah: I just hope this ends soon and we're all alright......
Nathan: Speaking of which, I hope Brian's ok.
Kyle: I'm sure he's fine. Probably hiding in the bathroom.
Sarah: I hope so too....wait, something's happening!

[Back to the men]

The leader had completely lost it. With his men not responding, the power being cut, this useless person beside him (his opinion), and the strange fog that is slowly filling the room causes him to snap. Unholstering his gun, he fires into the air before yelling, "I DON'T KNOW WHO YOU ARE AND I DON'T CARE! SHOW YOURSELF RIGHT NOW OR I START SHOOTING!", he then lowers the gun towards the hostages who are panicking and screaming.

Still hiding nearby, "and this is why I'm on standby". Taking a deep breath, she flips open the watch and is engulfed in a black light. Everyone else sees the light, of course they do there it is pitch black after all, and she knows it so she acts quickly.

Staying low, she runs full speed towards the armed leader. Surprised, but not taken aback, he starts to aim at her, but it didn't matter, he's too slow. Grabbing the arm with the gun, she raises and moves it to the side as he pulls the trigger, the bullets harmlessly sent down a hallway. Clenching her free hand, she brings it up and slams it into the bottom of his jaw sending straight up and backwards. After flying for a few feet, he hits the ground and is swallowed by the rising fog.

Shaking in his boots, the underling looks at where his boss landed then back at her. Taking a step towards him, he jolts then steps back, "S-STAY AWAY FROM ME YOU MONSTER!". He completely forgets he has a weapon, not that it would matter as she jumps towards him and her fist embeds itself in his gut. As he falls into the fog, she leaps backwards and disappears down the hallway.

In the main lobby, a flash of green light and Adilya gasps for breath, "that was pushing it, but I needed speed so it couldn't be helped". She heads back into the auditorium she just left and checks on her friends and everyone else before taking the two men to the lobby and throwing them with the others. The elf then starts to look through behind the stands and booths until she finds a piece of paper and a pen. Writing BOSS in big bold letters, she then puts it on the leader and with all twelve men taken care of, she heads to the men's room.

Pushing the door open, she stops and then looks behind her, "looks like that was just in time", she says to herself as her large ears pickup loud noises coming from the lobby she just left, "guess the police couldn't wait any longer".

She enters the bathroom and transforms back to Brian, "now to make this look realistic". Leaning himself against the sink, he closes his eyes and with the sleep spell surrounding him, drifts off to sleep.
11211111111111111111111111111111.title: Off to Dreamland

choices: A call and an overdue checking
112111111111111111111111111111111.content:
When he comes to, Brian finds himself outside the theater, hooked up to machines and in the middle of being examined by doctors. They tell him not to move as they continue to look him over. Playing the victim, he asks what happened and they tell him about the attack on the theater, the "gas", and how they found him in the restroom and that they are now checking him out to make sure the gas didn't do anything to him. After taking a few samples for later testing, they tell him that he seems alright and that it looked like the gas was just some kind of sleeping drug so he can go.

Outside the makeshift hospital, he stretches and shakes his head, still a bit woozy from his own spell, "Man that packs a punch! Didn't think it would be that strong". Taking a few steps forward, someone yells at him.

???: There he is! Over there!
???: Oh? You're right!

He turns around to see his friends running towards him.

Sarah: I'm so glad you're alright! We were so worried!
Nathan: Yeah, we thought that they might of found you.
Kyle: So tell us! What happened to you?
Amy: If Karen was here she would have gone after you for that.
Kyle: Why?
Nathan: Don't worry about it.
He tells them what "happened" to him.
Kyle: So you got out easy. Managed to avoid them in the bathroom but the sleep stuff got ya". A big smile then crosses his face, "you may have gotten off easy, but WE got to see the little monster girl!" When he says this everyone, including Brian, seem hesitant to continue; however, Brian breaks the silence by saying, "Really? You're sure?". He immediately responds, "Yes! Really! We watched her beat up the two that took us hostage! Man is she strong!"
Nathan follows up, "Well.....we did see a small figure that looked like a girl take them out....".
Kyle: She didn't just take them out! She destroyed them! She sent one flying with one uppercut and took out the other with a single blow to the gut! It was awesome! Just what you'd expect from a supernatural creature!"
Amy: N-now that I have to object to.....M-magic and supernatural stuff just doesn't exist.....
Kyle: Really? Then how do you explain the gas? I don't even think it was gas!
Amy: Of course it was! It was some kind of sleeping gas.
Kyle: Then how did she sneak it into the theater? They're still looking for the canisters and can't find them! And there would have to be a lot of em to fill the place up like she did!
Amy: I don't know....but it's a lot more reasonable than magic!
Sarah: Wow....we usually don't see this side of Amy.
Nathan: Well that's what happens when something "unscientific" is involved.
Kyle: Jeez. You guys really are stubborn. Why can't you all just get it already?
Amy,Sarah,&Nathan: THAT'S WHAT WE WANT TO SAY TO YOU!

Their talking comes to an end when they see that it's starting to get late.
Nathan: Oh. I should probably head home now, sure my parents are worried about me.
Sarah: Same. Bet they want to know what happened.
Kyle: Fine....We'll continue this later!
Amy: That's fine with me!
They say their goodbyes and head to their separate homes.

He begins his trek home when he stops in his tracks, "Oh crap!", he suddenly yells before turning back around. Heading back to the entrance, we walks up to the police who are standing guard over the entrance.
Brian: Yeah...um...I left a bag in one of the lockers in there....Can I go get it.....Or could someone get it for me?", he says, showing the key to it that he still had on him. They look at each other, then one of them asks for the key then goes to retrieve the bag. Brian thanks him and then heads back. "Good thing I got this back. Last thing I want is for someone to find my girls' clothing in here...."

Heading home, he figures he should give his parents a call since the doctors or police most likely called them. Putting the bag away, he grabs his phone and turns on the TV.....
112111111111111111111111111111111.title: Aftermath

choices: More Crime fighting? Or a break?
More Crime fighting? Or a break?
1121111111111111111111111111111111.content:
A quick call to his parents and sister to tell them what happened and that he's alright before he finds a news channel.

"Let's see whats being said about me".

"AND NOW FOR OUR SPECIAL SEGMENT ABOUT THE MYSTERIOUS PAIR THAT THE ENTIRE CITY IS TALKING ABOUT"
Brian: Well that's convenient.
"WE ALL KNOW ABOUT THE INCIDENT AT THE FAST FOOD RESTAURANT WHERE THE SMALL GIRL IN BLACK WAS FIRST SIGHTED WHEN SHE DEALT WITH THE TWO ROBBERS THERE AND THE FOLLOWING CLAIMS OF MONSTER, GHOST AND SUCH. HOWEVER, MORE SIGHTINGS AND CASES OF HER INVOLVEMENT HAVE OCCURRED SINCE THEN, AND WE WILL TELL YOU ALL THAT WE KNOW. HER NEXT APPEARANCE HAS ALREADY BEEN REPORTED ON, BUT WE NOW HAVE NEW DEVELOPMENTS THAT WE WILL GET TO. YESTERDAY WAS WHEN DOLPHIN MIDDLE SCHOOL WAS TAKEN OVER BY A GROUP OF ARMED MEN AND THEY WERE TAKEN OUT BY THE MYSTERIOUS GIRL AND A NEW ONE THAT WAS DESCRIBED AS AN "ELF" OF ALL THINGS. THOUGH SHE WAS ONLY SEEN FOR A SPLIT SECOND SO THIS INFORMATION IS......QUESTIONABLE......THESE TWO MANAGED TO SNEAK INTO THE SCHOOL, GETTING PAST ALL THE POLICE AND THUGS THEN SAVING THE HOSTAGES WHILE TAKING OUT ALL OF THE ATTACKERS. THEY THEN DISAPPEAR WITH THE ONLY SIGHING BEING THAT BRIEF MOMENT IN THE GYMNASIUM. NEW INFORMATION ABOUT THIS IS THAT THEY ENTERED FROM THE ROOF, MAKING A HOLE IN THE ROOM AND IN THE FLOOR OF THE CLASSROOM BELOW IT. FROM HERE THEY INFILTRATED THE SECURITY ROOM WITHOUT BEING NOTICED AND TURNED OFF THE POWER, THE REST IS AS PREVIOUSLY STATED. BUT WHY DID THESE MEN TARGET THE SCHOOL? WE NOW KNOW THE ANSWER. ONE OF THE MEN CONFESSED AND SAID THAT THEY WERE LOOKING FOR, GET THIS, THE VERY GIRL IN BLACK THAT STOPPED THEM. HE SAID THAT SHE HAD INTERFERED WITH ANOTHER ONE OF THEIR GROUPS AND THAT THEY WERE SENT TO THE MIDDLE SCHOOL TO LOOK FOR HER THINKING THAT SHE WAS A STUDENT THERE DUE TO HER SIZE. HE THEN STATED THAT THEY CHECKED MULTIPLE TIMES AND COULDN'T FIND ANYONE THAT LOOKED EVEN REMOTELY LIKE HER. IN SHORT, THEY WERE LOOKING FOR REVENGE AGAINST SOMEONE THAT WENT AGAINST THEM. IF YOU ASK ME, THAT'S PRETTY TYPICAL IN THIS CITY.

YOU WOULD THINK THAT THE NEXT CASE WOULD BE THE THEATER INCIDENT WHICH JUST HAPPENED A FEW HOURS AGO, BUT YOU'D BE WRONG. THEY APPEARED ONE MORE TIME YESTERDAY. IT WAS IN THE DEAD OF NIGHT WHEN TWO MEN MUGGED A WOMAN IN THE CITY. ACCORDING TO HER AND THE TWO MEN AFTER THEY WERE ARRESTED, SEVERAL ARROWS LANDED AROUND THEM AND THEN THE SMALL GIRL IN BLACK FELL FROM THE SKY AND KNOCKED THEM OUT. THE WOMAN SAID THAT THE GIRL JUMPED UP ONTO A NEARBY BUILDING AND DISAPPEARED.....REALLY? ARROWS, FALLING FROM THE SKY, AND JUMPING REALLY HIGH.....WELL IT WAS DARK OUT.....TAKE IT HOW YOU WANT.

NOW FOR THE LATEST STORY, THE THEATER. THE MEN ATTACKED THE PLACE LOOKING TO MAKE SOME QUICK CASH. THEIR PLAN FAILED WHEN THE GUARDS NOTICED AND LOCKED THEMSELVES IN THE SECURITY ROOM AND CONTACTED THE POLICE. THE MEN TRIED TO FLEE, BUT SOME POLICEMEN WERE NEARBY AND GOT THERE FAST ENOUGH TO PREVENT THIS. WITH NO OTHER CHOICE THE MEN TOOK THE STAFF AND MOVIE GOERS HOSTAGE. THEY LOCKED THE STAFF IN A UTILITY ROOM AND PUT MEN IN THE THEATERS WITH THE OTHERS. THEIR PLAN WAS TO USE THEM TO ESCAPE; HOWEVER, THIS WAS THWARTED BY THE PAIR SHOWING UP. ONCE AGAIN, THEY SOMEHOW SLIPPED IN UNNOTICED, AND NO, NO HOLES THIS TIME. THEY THEN RELEASED THAT BLUISH GREEN GAS THAT FLOODED THE THEATER. IT WAS SO THICK THAT THE SECURITY CAMERAS COULDN'T PICK UP ANYTHING. EVERYONE THAT CAME INTO CONTACT WITH THE GAS WAS KNOCKED OUT, LEADING EXPERTS TO BELIEVE IT WAS A FORM OF SLEEPING GAS. WE SAY BELIEVE BECAUSE NO TRACE OF IT COULD BE FOUND. NOT INSIDE OR ON ANY OF THE HOSTAGES OR ASSAILANTS, DESPITE IT COVERING EVERYTHING NOTHING WAS FOUND, NOT EVEN THE MEANS TO WHICH IT WAS RELEASED. THIS HAS BAFFLED A LOT OF PEOPLE ONTO HOW THEY DID THIS. ON A SIDE NOTE, THE GAS WAS FOUND TO BE NON LETHAL. ALL IT DID WAS PUT PEOPLE TO SLEEP. THE GAS ENTERED THE THREE AUDITORIUMS THAT THE HOSTAGES WERE BEING HELD IN AND TWO OF THE ROOMS FELL TO THE GAS. THE LAST ROOM POSED A PROBLEM. THE LEADER OF THE MEN WAS THERE. AND IT IS BELIEVED THAT HIS PLAN FALLING APART, THE LIGHTS GOING OUT, HIS MEN GETTING TAKEN DOWN, AND THE GAS FLOODING THE ROOM MADE HIM SNAP. HE DEMANDED THAT WHOEVER WAS RESPONSIBLE SHOW THEMSELVES OR HE WOULD SHOOT THE HOSTAGES....WELL....SHE DID, THE SMALL ONE ANYWAY. ACCORDING TO THE HOSTAGES, "IT FLEW INTO THE ROOM AT UNNATURAL SPEED AND DEFLECTED HIS GUN LIKE IT WAS A TOY. IT THEN SENT THE MAN FLYING ACROSS THE ROOM BEFORE DEALING WITH THE OTHER IN A SINGLE PUNCH". SHE THEN JUMPED BACK INTO THE HALL AND DISAPPEARED. THIS WAS THE ONLY SIGHTING OF THE MYSTERIOUS LITTLE GIRL IN BLACK. AS FOR THE SO CALLED ELF, THE SECURITY GUARDS THAT HAD BARRED THEMSELVES IN THE SECURITY ROOM DID SAY THAT ONE OF THE TWO TALKED TO THEM. WHICHEVER ONE IT WAS ASKED HOW MANY MEN ATTACKED THE THEATER. THEY SAID THEY ANSWERED HER QUESTION BEFORE THE GAS GOT THEM. WE BELIEVE IT WAS THE "ELF " THAT TALKED TO THEM BECAUSE ACCORDING THE THE GUARDS, IT SOUNDED LIKE IT BELONGED SOMEONE OLDER. AFTER ALL TWELVE MEN WERE TAKEN CARE OF, THE DISAPPEARED FROM THE THEATER AS MYSTERIOUSLY AS THEY CAME. NO ONE SAW THEM LEAVE JUST AS NO ONE SAW THEM ENTER.

AND HERE WE ARE. WITH ALL THESE INCIDENTS BEHIND US NOW, WE GET TO THE REAL QUESTION, ARE THESE TWO GOOD AND SHOULD THEY BE DOING WHAT THEY'RE DOING, OR IN OTHER WORDS, IS THEIR HELP WANTED OR NEEDED? SOME TOP OFFICIALS ACCUSE THEM OF BEING NOTHING BUT VIGILANTES DOING A WHOLE SUPERNATURAL STICK AND THAT THEIR INTERFERENCE WILL CAUSE MORE HARM THAN GOOD. THE PROBLEM WITH THIS IS THAT MORE PEOPLE SEEM TO BE ON THEIR SIDE. EVERYONE FROM POLICE OFFICERS TO OFFICIALS TO CIVILIANS SEEM TO OVERWHELMINGLY AGREE THAT THEY WANT THESE TWO TO KEEP IT UP. HERE ARE A FEW EXAMPLES OF WHAT THEY SAID.
"Finally, someone is standing up to these criminals"
"We are outnumbered and outgunned. We need all the help we can get".
"With how bad this city has gotten, I don't care if some random people want to help. Someone has to do it".
"I don't trust our leaders with this. It's been years and things are only getting worse".
AND SO ON. NOW THERE ARE NEGATIVE COMMENTS ON THEM, BUT THEIR IN THE MINORITY. SO THAT CONCLUDES OUR SPECIAL SEGMENT ON THE MYSTERIOUS DUO THAT HAS APPEARED AND IS FIGHTING CRIME. IT WILL ONLY BE A MATTER OF TIME BEFORE WE TRULY FIND OUT IF WE CAN RELY ON THESE TWO OR IF THEIR ACTIONS WILL CAUSE MORE HARM THAN GOOD.

"As I expected", Brian says, "Some like me, some don't. I don't care though, I'm doing this for myself, my friends, and because it's whats right". He turns off the TV and heads to his room.
1121111111111111111111111111111111.title: Summary of Major Events Till Now

11211111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"I should probably head out again.....those guys at the theater were pretty easy to deal with. I'm not tired at all from it". Making sure the house was locked up, he transforms into Raven and leaves through his window as he has done before. About an hour in and it would seem to be a quiet night, for once, "huh, guess the theater business might of made some second guess doing anything bad tonight".

The sun has long set and after another couple hours of nothing, she decides to head home for the night.

Near her house, she suddenly stops and lays down on the roof that she is currently on. On the other side of the street Raven can see two figures heading away from her house, one slightly bigger than the other. The importance of this is that he knows them very well.

The two figures are Karen and Katie. "What are they doing out this late? I mean, I'm glad Katie is ok and we are fairly far from the city, but this place is still dangerous, especially at night!". As a just in case, she cautiously tails them, making sure that she is not seen by them.

(By the way, Katie has long brown hair and blue yes. She is taller than someone her age, she is almost as tall as Karen, and her breasts are bigger than Karen's indicating that she has a far better future ahead of her than her older sister. Because of her height, she plays on the basketball team at Dolphin Middle.)

Now Raven doesn't mean to, but because she is watching them, she can't help but overhear their conversation.

Karen: Let's just hurry this up so we can get back faster. Don't feel comfortable being out at this hour.
Katie: Yeah, I know. Especially after what just happened.
Karen: On that subject, are you sure you should be out? You don't have to push yourself.
Katie: I'm fine. And as I already told you, they didn't do anything to us. Just made us sit in the middle of the gym. I mean, it was scary, but that was it.
Karen: I know......it's just.....
Katie: And I understand and thank you for you worrying about me, but I really am fine, and besides.....I got to see those two! Well.....sort of.....Oh! We're almost there.

The sister's destination was a nearby gas station/convenience store. Raven just sits outside on a nearby rooftop while her friends buy what they came for then head home. Watching them walk back, she notices movement in the corner of her eye. Four men, hiding behind the store eyeing up her friends. "Oh no you don't!", Raven almost yells as she jumps off her building and makes her way to the other side.

Two of the men had circled around and walk out in front of the girls. When they see this, they immediately know that they mean trouble and back up ready to sprint back to the store only to be met by the other two. The men laugh as they close in on them, one of them pulling a pistol on them, "You girls know the drill, give us everything you haUAGH!".

That sound at the end? That was caused by Raven jumping from the house next to them and onto him. Before anyone could react, she reaches up and grabs the other man by the shirt and slams him face first into the sidewalk. Her head down, she slowly stands up. Both the sisters and the men frozen in place as she takes a few steps toward them. Lifting a foot, she brings it down on the pistol near the guy she landed on, smashing it and causing them to jump in response. Out of sheer fear and panic, one of the remaining men take out another pistol; however, he doesn't even get the chance to aim at her. She dashes through the sisters and her knee finds the side of the man's face. As he crumples to the ground, she backhands the other guy, sending him onto his back and knocking him out.

Standing there, her back to her friends, she begins to walk away when Katie calls out to her. "U-um", she says, one of her arms reaching out. Raven stops, but doesn't turn around. "W-what are you doing!?", Karen says in surprise. Katie doesn't answer, instead, she continues, "I-I just wanted to thank you for the other day....and um just now as well". Glancing back, Raven says, "....oh....it's you, from the school....", beginning to walk again, " Guess trouble likes you.....Both of you should hurry home. This town IS very dangerous", and with that, she jumps to the rooftops and out of sight.

(Though secretly she still watches over them until they make it home.)

With her friends safe and sound, she opens the window to her room and goes inside.....
11211111111111111111111111111111111.title: Another Night Patrol

112111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Closing and locking the window, she turns on the lights and tosses the bag onto the bed. Kicking off her shoes and socks, sliding down and stepping out of her shorts, and pulling off her gloves and throwing off her shirt, she steps out of her room and into the dark hallway in the buff. to her left is the stairs to the first floor, across from her room is her older sister who is, again, gone most of the time for college, and to her right is the bathroom which is next to her sister's room and a closet which is across from it and next to her room. In between the bathroom and her sister's room is another hallway which goes to the room her parent's use as well as another bathroom and closet.

Switching the lights in the nearby bathroom on, Raven gets the water running. Reaching for her toothbrush she gets ready for bed as the tub fills up. Testing the water with one of her feet, she finds the temperature just right and gets in. Slipping into the water, she stretches and relaxes after another hard day of heroing. Time passes and raising one of her arms out of the water, she moves it to the side of the tub and stops. Hesitating for only a second before pressing a button on it's side. Jets embedded inside the tub come to life. As the water begins to churn and bubbles rise to the surface, Raven is caught off guard by the bubbles massaging her entire body. Unlike anything she felt as a man when she used it, she immediately puts it up to full throttle and her entire body twitches at the intensified rush of new sensations coursing through her body. It was as if she was melting into the water. She does eventually turn if off, after a long session of stimulation, she gets out, drains the tub and dries off.

Heading back to her room, and yes she is still naked, she takes note of what time it is, "yeah, too late. Gonna go to bed after I get a quick bite to eat", she says to herself, her stomach reminding her that she hasn't eaten since the theater incident earlier that day.

The stairs to the second floor are to the right of the front door, from when you walk in, the living room is to the right after a bit of wall in between. The kitchen is right ahead and to the left along the wall is a bathroom and closet. To the left of the kitchen is the garage. From the living room, head to the kitchen and that is where the dining room is located. And of course connected to the back of the kitchen is a door that leads to a fenced in backyard.

Making her way to the kitchen, she opens the fridge and after pulling out a few things, makes herself a quick dinner. After cleaning up she checks the locks and turns off every light.
