Then heading upstairs and back to her room, she takes the bag off of the bed and places it into her closet. Collecting the clothes that she took off and laying them on top of the bag, she then closes the closet, turns off the lights, and crawls into bed.

The Next Day

What wakes Raven up isn't the sound of birds chirping or the sunlight shining through the window. It was something familiar, something that she has gone through and heard countless times.

Karen: Brian! Time to wake up! I know we don't have school, but that doesn't mean you should sleep all day!

Jumping up so fast that she almost falls out of bed, she starts to panic, "W-where is it! Where is it!", she says over and over, looking for the watch that she took off before taking her bath, all while Karen's footsteps get closer and closer.....
112111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Relaxation and Home Layout

1121111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
"Of course!", she almost yells, scrambling to get to her closet. Practically flinging it open, she spots the watch. She had placed it on top of Raven's clothes which were on top of the bag. Leaping for it, she grabs the watch and brief moment of relief was abruptly ended by the sound of a doorknob being turned.

A cold sweat runs down her neck while she is frozen in place, the door knob starting to turn.....only to suddenly stop, then jiggles back and forth.

Karen: What? It's locked!? He never locks his door! Open up and wake up already Brian! Let me in!

Collapsing onto the bag, "T-thank god I thought to lock my door.....That was way too close......"

Wrapping the watch around her wrist, she goes into the closet and closes it before transforming into Heather and then back to Brian so Karen won't see the light it gives off. Coming out of the closet, he unlocks and opens the door to an angry and upset Karen.

Putting her hands on her hips, "finally. Can't believe you actually locked the door".
Brian: Yeah....Sorry about that.....Don't even remember doing it.
Karen: Well......Whatever.....You're up and breakfast is ready so lets go.

Together they walk down the hall and the smell of eggs and bacon meet him when he reaches the stairs. This was another normal day for them. Both Karen and Katie would come over to his house quite often, they do have their own keys to his house, they would often hang out and sometimes Katie would cook for them, Karen is not the greatest cook out there. Guess you could call this a benefit of childhood friends that live next to each other.

Sitting down on a couch by the TV in the living room, she flips to one of her favorite morning shows as Brian goes to the kitchen. Walking in he asks Katie, "need any help?". She looks back and responds, "yeah, could you take care of the stuff over there?", she says while pointing to a pan on a burner. "Alright", he is pretty good at cooking himself, spending most of the time in an empty house with two parents whose work keeps them away most of the time and an older sister who mostly stays at college has made him pretty independent.

The two finish making breakfast and take it to the dinning room. Karen gets up from the couch and joins them. Brian then brings up the "incident" at the middle school, making it look like he barely knew anything about it.

Brian: So I guess that you're ok? You know.....
Katie: Huh? Oh! The school thing.....Yeah. They didn't do anything to us and I was already cleared by the hospital.
Brian: Then that's good.
Karen: Enough about that! It's old news, just wait till we tell you about last night!

Her saying this makes Brian choke on his food. A coughing fit follows as he reaches for a drink. Quickly downing the water and calming the fit, they ask if he's alright and he says, "y-yeah. What happened last night?

"We saw her", Karen says, a big smile on her face. "W-who?", Brian responds. "Her! You know, the small girl in black!". Feigning surprise,"R-REALLY!?". "Yes! Really!".
Katie: We did something stupid last night.
Brian: Something stupid?
Katie: Yeah.....We went to the gas station that was close by to get some stuff last night. We were attacked by some men on our way back.
Brian: You were attacked? Are you two alright?
Katie: We're fine. That girl saved us.
Karen: It was unreal. She was as small as everyone says, and to her, it was as if they were toys", she then sighs, "I hate agreeing with him, but maybe Kyle's right. That strength wasn't normal". Still playing the fool, "what do you mean? Not normal.....". Her exuberant expression turns into a frown, "she smashed a gun with her foot, moved faster than I've every seen anyone move, took down four men who were twice her size in one hit, and then jumped to the top of a house in one go.....That is what mean.....".
Brian: Um....are you alright? You seemed so exited.....".
Katie: It's kinda complicated.....", saying with a slight smile. Karen then looks at her, and then back at Brian, "no it's not.....I am really glad that I got to see one of them.....it's just that when I think of later.....".
Brian: Later.....!.....Kyle.....
Karen: What he'll say when he finds out.....
Katie:....ahahaha......
Brian:........
Karen: Maybe we shouldn't tell him.....
Katie: That's a little.....
Brian: Should probably tell him.....
Karen:.....Yeah.....I know......

After taking the dishes to the kitchen, Karen and Katie leave, saying they still have a few things to take care of leaving Brian to himself again. Walking upstairs and back to his room, he opens his closet and picks up the watch.

5 days since he got his powers
4 days since he first used them
So on this Wednesday morning, what will he do now?
1121111111111111111111111111111111111.title: A Lucky Break

11211111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Both cards are placed on his bed and as he looks them over, a hand gets placed under his chin as she says to himself, "I've got three choices. Who should I go as? Can't go as myself, don't want to risk anyone noticing me and stopping my patrol. So that means I should go into town as Heather, Raven, or Adilya.....". Mulling over this for a few minutes, he makes his choice.

And the light that floods the room is.....black. He has decided to go around town as Raven.

Removing her battle clothes and opening the closet, she goes through and picks out a top and skirt to wear. She steps into and pulls a pair of white and blue stripped panties up her leg, remembering what the clerk taught her, takes a matching bra and tucks her small breasts into the bra cups, zips up a black skirt around her waist, and a black and blue top is pulled on. Sitting on the edge of her bed, she puts on a pair of white socks and black shoes before getting up, putting her battle clothes into the bag, and heading out the door....not before making sure no one sees her.

Instead of sticking to the rooftops, she decides to walk to the city. Along the way, her phone goes off; however, she doesn't answer it. The reason for this is because it was Kyle calling. Out in the middle of town and as a girl, there was no way she could answer. A few seconds after the call ends, her phone vibrates, someone just sent her a message. Looking at it, and just as she thought, it was Kyle.

"JUST WANTED TO LET YOU KNOW THAT WE'RE GOING BACK TO THE CITY TODAY. GOING TO GO TO A FEW STORES, MAYBE THE PARK, MAYBE A FEW OTHER PLACES. CAN'T IMAGINE WHY, BUT WE DECIDED NOT TO SEE ANY MOVIES TODAY! LET US KNOW IF YOU CAN COME OR NOT. BY THE WAY, KAREN CAN'T MAKE IT".

Replying to the message, and getting a response, she puts her phone back into her skirt pocket before saying to herself, "Sorry, but I'm spending all day in hero mode".

Despite all of the incidents over the last few days, the center of the city is as lively as it usually is during the weekend. There are more police than usual in the area, but that's to be expected with everything that has happened. Walking through the crowded streets, she stops at one of the stalls and buys a blueberry snow cone. Enjoying her icy treat on this hot day, she looks for trouble while having fun on her patrol. She looks through alleys, plays some games from some stalls, checks the less traveled and off path sections of the park/forest, buys another snow cone, and checks abandoned buildings in the area while taking in the familiar sights in her new form. "Nothing. There is absolutely nothing going on......There are usually multiple crimes committed each day.....and nothing! Not that that's a bad thing.....Maybe I should of went with my friends today", and as if on cue, she spots them in the distance.

They are coming out of the park, not too far in front of her. Panicking for a sec, she then remembers that they don't know who she is, "right. Even though I saved them yesterday, they didn't see me....Very few people should know what I look like", but to be on the safe side, she avoids them.

About 10 minutes later of checking behind more alleys and corners and still nothing. She doesn't even hear any police sirens in he distance, because of all of this, she was just about to give up and enjoy her day off or head home when she gets a strange feeling. Stopping in the middle of the path, she looks around, it feels like someone is watching her. It was then that she spots them. It wasn't any of the thugs that she beat up that got away and recognizer her or some assassination attempt sent by whoever shes fighting, no, for some reason, it's her friends that are tailing her. Keeping their distance, they are trying to hide themselves while following her.

"Why? They shouldn't recognize me! The spell from the theater should have knocked them out and hid my appearance! So why!?". Picking up the pace, she then cuts into an alley. Making sure no one is looking, she jumps straight up and then hides herself and waits.

From her perch, she watches as Kyle peeks around the corner, then with a look of surprise and shock, yells, "WHAT!?", as he practically leaps into the opening of the alley. Still stunned, he walks into the alley while Sarah, Nathan, and Amy appear and join him. Turning to them while pointing a finger down the alley, "See! I told you! That girl IS one of them!", the others weren't so quick to agree. They look at each other before Ami says, "I-I'll admit that it's strange how she just disappeared.....but....".

Kyle: And as I said, I know what the short one looks like! I saw her face in the theater!
Raven: !!!!!!!
Nathan: Yeah....Could you explain that again? I still can't believe you got a clear look at her with the fog and how fast she was moving.....
Sarah: It's not like we don't believe you....it's just....very hard to.....

He sighs and tells them, again, what happened, "As you all remember, when that guy who threatened them to "show yourself", I was in an aisle seat right next to the hallway the small girl in black came from when she attacked them. Of course I didn't see her then, she was moving too fast. It was when she jumped back into the hallway that I got a good and clear look at her face".

Ami: That's what you've said a few times now...but...are you sure? I mean, that fog was affecting us by that point, are you sure you CLEARLY saw it?
Kyle: Of course! That's why I was so surprised when we came out of the park! That girl looked exactly like her!
Nathan: And then you made us follow her for a while.
Kyle: Which turned out to be a good idea. C'mon! You all saw her strange behavior. Checking alleys, looking behind buildings and dark and suspicious areas. Would someone who's just hanging out in town do that?
Sarah: That was strange.....
Kyle: Then she just vanishes into thin air! This alley is a dead end, no way out except from where we're standing! And nowhere to hide! So tell me, where did she go? She must of used her powers to escape!
Ami: Powers.....Ugh, just saying the word.....And the fact that I can't explain where she went.....
Nathan: Oh. Just thought of something. What were you going to do if you caught her Kyle?", surprised by this, he replies, "huh? Oh....well....I didn't think that through!".
Ami Nathan & Sarah: Of course.....
Kyle: ......But I guess I just wanted to confirm if I had the right person and if she really had powers.....
Ami: Wow, an actual answer.

The two of them then start to fight among themselves while Raven continued to listen in overhead, "guess I got careless when I took those two out and needed to breathe. Note to self, be more careful from now on".
11211111111111111111111111111111111111.title: Recognized

112111111111111111111111111111111111111.content:
Leaving her bewildered and arguing friends behind, Raven moves a few rooftops over before opening the bag. A quick clothing swap later and she is back in her default clothes, "That was fun, but it's time to get serious". Doing her best not to get seen by the crowded streets below, she leaps from building to building all over the city, looking for trouble.

At the edge of the city near her home and deciding whether to head back or not, a sudden deafening explosion rips through the air. Immediately she turns around to see a skyscraper on the other side of the city on fire. Heading towards the burning building, she stops just short and crouches down on the building she is currently on because the police and news crews have already arrived.

As it turns out, the fire isn't all that bad. Only a small section of the skyscraper is open and the flames are mostly gone. Now knowing how this happened, she then gets an idea. Backing away from the scene, she jumps into a back alley and switches to Heather. Blending in with the crowd, she gets close to the reporters to figure things out.

"THIS JUST IN. A GROUP OF TERRORISTS HAVE TAKEN OVER AND ARE HOLDING DOZENS OF PEOPLE HOSTAGE. THE EXPLOSION EARLIER WAS A WARNING TO SHOW HOW SERIOUS THEY ARE AND FOR THE POLICE TO STAY OUTSIDE. WE DO NOT KNOW HOW MANY THERE ARE, WHAT THEY WANT, OR WHY THEY ARE DOING THIS".

Walking away, "Building takeover, hostages, explosives, building surrounded by police and cameras.....This time....I am lost.....How did they even get all that stuff in there unnoticed?". Now some distance, pacing in circles, she continues to ponder all of this and if there is even anything for her to do.....Until she notices something in the ground, "A manhole?.....!.....It can't be!".

Finding a secluded place nearby, she transforms back to Raven and heads back to said manhole. Bending over, she picks it up, jumps in, and closes the opening behind her. Thankfully the sewer system under the system is pretty big. Two walkways are on both sides while the waste water flows through the middle. Heading in the general direction of the skyscraper, she turns a corner and notices something odd. "Lots of footprints and tracks like something was being dragged.....", she grins, "pretty heavy traffic we got here for a sewer". Following the tracks and checking every corner, she eventually finds where they lead. Peeking around another corner, she discovers that a hole in the side wall of the one of the pathways of the sewer had been made, and not only that, there was an armed guard in front of it. "I see", she says to herself, "That explains how they and their gear got in. They made a hole in the sewer to the lower level of that skyscraper and snuck in, then when they were ready, attacked, took hostages, and rigged the building with explosives. Now, how do I get past that guard.....Of course! This is where Adilya shines!".

Zack: In a bit. I want to try out a few more things, I mean, don't you find it interesting that the ears and tail changed color when they touched you? I am using a pencil, and when the ears attached themselves to you, and after I drew the tail on you, then changed color from gray to black, matching your hair. I have to try some other things.

Zack opens a bag from the side of the bed, "I got this while I was looking up how to change you back". He takes out a blue pen. "Now, if I remember right, the clothes and so on will change color to match the person on their own; however, if I want to change it myself, I have to use something like this".

He taps her hair with the tip from the blue pen. The blue dot that was placed on her black hair starts to spread, changing her hair, giving her blue hair. She touches her hair in surprise. Zack, then taps her tail, it changes to blue, and before she could react, taps 1 of her eyes. She now has blue hair, a blue cat tail, 1 blue eye and 1 green eye.

He draws a mirror next to her, and she takes it. She looks herself over, stunned and in shock.

Zack: Oh man, this is fun. I will never get bored of this. So what should I do next.....
1551111211121111.title: Accessories.

15511112111211111.content:
Zack: Lets go with this theme for a while.
Jackie: Theme?
Zack: Yeah, look in the mirror again.
Jackie: Why? I just......Oh my god! My eyes!

Her eyes now looked like a cats.

Zack: You'll slowly become cat like. That was the desire that I put into those items, so they will come true. By wanting an item to do something, you have to wish for it as you're drawing it.

Jackie: I-I don't want to be a cat!
Zack: It wont be so bad, and you won't go full cat, at least for now. I may do that later, but this is far enough. And you don't have a choice, I'll give you an example.

He draws a stick with a toy mouse attached to a string. He then starts to dangle it in front of her. She tries to resits, she REALLY tries, but she just can not take her eyes off of it. Slowly, she finds herself moving her head with it, then, after balling up her fists, she starts to bat at it. Finally, she gives in and pounces. She plays with the cat toy for several minutes before she regains her senses. Her face turns a very bright red as her eyes open real wide. Standing up, she turns away from him.

Zack: Hahaha. That was fun.....See? I told you it was going to happen.

He starts to stroke the back of her head with 1 of his fingers. She shudders at its touch, and she doesn't resist. She tries to deny it, but she is enjoying his petting her. Turning around, he starts to pet the front of her head. She still avoids looking at him; however, she finds herself purring. (What am I doing? Am I really becoming a cat!?)

Using his free hand to pet her, he draws a large cat bed with a few pillows in it. Jackie lazily stares at it. She gets on all 4s and walks to the bed. She stares at it, then gets in and lays down, with her head on 1 of the pillows. Zack keeps petting her until she falls asleep.

After she starts sleeping, Zack draws a blanket and lays it over her, "there, she finally fell aslee", he takes out several different colored pens and pencils, "time to get started".
15511112111211111.title: Its unavoidable.

155111121112111111.content:
Jackie wakes up shortly after Zack finishes his masterpiece.

She sits up, her eyes barely open. She looks around, then rubs her eyes and looks again.

Chairs, couches, tables, a bathroom and kitchen, and all sorts of cat toys were all over the page that she is still trapped in, and everything was way too colorful.

Zack: Well? Do you like it? Took me 2 hours to draw it all.
Jackie: W-what is all this!?
Zack: Your room.
Jackie: What?
Zack: Its your room, you know, where you'll sleep, eat, and so on.
Jackie:.....
Zack: Now that you're rested, lets move on. If you would go over to the next page, we'll continue.
155111121112111111.title: A place to rest.

15511112112.content: What could possibly go wrong in a library?

1551111212.content:
Jackie: Well.....I guess it wouldn't hurt to have you show me around, this is my 1st time here.
Katie: Yeah! Just give me a second!

.....

Katie:Alright! Let me show you around!
1551111212.title: Have Katie show her around.

15511112121.content:
As Katie drags her all around the library, "we have all kinds of books about all kinds of subjects brought from all over the planet, as well as a few others. These range from stories, to facts, to magic books".
Jackie: Magic books?
Katie: Yeah, should I show you some?
Jackie: Yeah!

Katie leads her to a section marked MAGIC.

Katie: This section is where all our magic books should be.
Jackie: Should be?
Katie: Oh yeah, some of the residents love to play pranks on each other, they'll use the spells, place the books with traps on them that trigger when opened on some random shelf, and even some of the books themselves seem to have a mind of there own. I tell ya, those books are the most troublesome, they've reappeared in the strangest places.
Jackie:.....

What magic book do they look at?
15511112121.title: Magic book section,

15511112122.content: Whatever should Jackie do in such a large library?

1551112.content: More things that will happen to the individual gruopls/solo people.

15511121.content: Lets go with Keith. Keith: Short black hair and black eyes.
15511121.title: Keith.

155111211.content:
With Alex's talk about this place makes him way too eager to explore this place.
Keith: Maybe I'll meet that hot vampire girl from before.
155111211.title: Solo

1551112111.content:
He eagerly looks to his left, his right, and the stairs, which way to go!? Its too exciting!

Eventually heading down the hallway to his right, he comes across something.

A door with a number on it, like all of the others, it is a hotel after all; however, he feels like he has to open it.....

What is behind the door?

15511121112.content: What is behind the door?
15511121112.title: Other.

155111211121.content:
The room was almost identical to his. The only difference was that the floor had a different colored carpet, there were strange personal items scattered around the place, and the bed and chairs were different than what you would normally find in an inn.

Keith: Huh, this room must belong to someone that lives here, like Alex said.

Something on the bed catches his attention. It looked like a bottle of pills with a note next to it. He reads the note.

Keith: "If you would like to see what life was like on the other side of the fence, try one of these magic pills". Other side of the fence? What the heck does that mean?

Setting the note down, he picks up the bottle and unscrews the lid. He looks inside at the circular blue pills.

Does he take one?
155111211121.title: A bottle and a note.

155112.content: They decide that it will be better for them to stick together.
155112.title: Stick together.

info.brief_description: Just as the title says. Stories that contain tf, tg, vore, ar, ap, and a whole lot more.
info.description:
Someone or a group of people discover that they or something or someone around them has the ability to do something abnormal.

Now I'll be even more lenient with this 1 in a few places. Rule time.

1.No m/m
2.No hardcore like hard vore, gore, stuff like that, though dismemberment is allowed, such as alive heads, being flattened just as long as there is no blood or serious pain. No death, unless they are monsters, bandits, etc.
3.I can edit or delete if i see it necessary.
4.Stuff like scat and digestion with vore is allowed ONLY if you keep it clean and with out too many details. Can be a little descriptive, but watch it. Example, using the toilet after eating someone, just don't make it too messy.
5.Keep entries clean, such as grammer.
6.No forced endings, you can end but always provide a 2nd choice.
7.Reminder no serious pain, no death,leading to death or anything like that, you can change anyone but they will go back to normal in the end.
8.You can switch between 1st and 3rd person and leave main character but come back to him/her.
Everything else goes for now, and your name, age and gender are determined by you.

NO REALLY SHORT CHAPTERS UNLESS YOUR CONTINUING TO A LONGER ONE. AND NO ADDING A LOT OF SHORT CHAPTERS ONLY TO BRANCH OFF TO 1 LONGER 1. HAVE HAD TROUBLE WITH THIS IN THE PAST.
